title: Amazon KDP Keyword Research Tutorial (Full 2025 Guide)
description:
Amazon KDP Keyword Research: Complete Beginners Guide (2025)

👉 The keyword tool I use in the video ► https://tinyurl.com/3akkbawp
Use code 'sambarnes' for a discount.

💬 Join My Premium Amazon KDP Community ► https://www.skool.com/self-publishing-accelerator/about

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyword research is a critical part of Amazon KDP and is what is going to allow customers to find your books on Amazon. In this video, I give a full Amazon KDP keyword research tutorial, show you tools you can use and do a live demonstration of keyword research.

This video was taken from my full Amazon KDP course which you can find on my channel.
